| HistoryText             = The War Witches are a group of three elder [[Dark Elves]] that served as [[Malekith (Earth-616)|Malekith]]'s war advisors.{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 2}} The tall and thin war witch enjoys making games of corrupting mortals with promises of power.{{r|Venom Vol 4 13}}

The War Witches were present during Malekith's attack on [[Manhattan]].{{r|War of the Realms Vol 1 1}} They used their own magic to disrupt [[Stephen Strange (Earth-616)|Doctor Strange]]'s magical abilities. [[Eric Brooks (Earth-616)|Blade]] eventually located the source of the magical disruption, but he was overpowered by the War Witches. [[Jane Foster (Earth-616)|Jane Foster]] happened to land on the rooftop where they were located, and she helped Blade kill all three of them.{{r|War of the Realms Vol 1 2}}

| Equipment               = [[Dreamstone|Dreamstones]]
| Transportation          = The witches are capable of teleportation.{{r|Venom Vol 4 13}}
